import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Sidebar from './sidebar'; import Comments from './comments'; import widgetdata from '../../data/widgetdata.json'; class RecoverAolmail extends Component { render() { let imgattr = 'image' let publicUrl = process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/' return (
NEWS
  • 28 JANUARY, 2020
  • BY ADMIN

How to Recover AOL Mail

AOL is an incredible email provider that provides various advantages and features. It is well-known for its reliability as well as its high level of security, and it is used by several people all over the world. You may use e-mail, instant messaging, online browsing, and a variety of other activities, all from within the same piece of desktop software. Essentially, it is an all-in-one solution. However, your AOL may get deactivated for many reasons and mistakes. You could also forget your login credentials. You will not be able to access your email in AOL if any of these circumstances apply to you. Keep reading to know how you can recover your lost AOL Mail Account.

How to Recover AOL Mail and Common Issues
AOL Mail: Simple and Free

There a several e-mails providing services that provide mailing services, one of them is AOL 295 Mail, an all-around messaging solution that boasts of online security and reliability of instant messaging and e-mails. The features of AOL mail are not limited to just messaging and e-mailing, users can web surf other internet-related things. AOL also provides user preference emails like AOL mail, sports, etc. Users can get free AOL mail by signing up on the AOL Mail 295 webpage.

AOL requires a user to sign up using a phone number and a password, which users often need to remember. Many AOL mail help sites provide support related to these queries. But often, they start to panic and get themselves strangles in the world of the internet, looking for answers. This article provides this solution, and users can find themselves at rest after implementing it.

Steps to Recover your Aol Mail

Before following the steps to recover the email and the possible issues with your AOL mail login error.

1. Checking the Internet Connection

Before reaching for any solution, It is necessary to know the actual problem. Sometimes users face internet connection issues which may show a login error on their screens. Before jumping towards resetting the password, ensure there are no internet connection issues and refresh the page a few times to ensure there are no internet issues.

2. Identifying the login error message

When you enter the wrong login details, it is important to note the error message displayed. Some of the most common error messages that you may be encountered are :

  • Invalid Password
  • First time signing here
  • No username found

In each case, you may have entered the wrong password or username. If it is a problem, make sure to enter the right details, and if the problem persists, you may have to reset the password, the steps of which are provided below.

3. Resetting the password

There are a few ways to recover your AOL mail that you can use:

  • Browsers often save the login credentials when creating a new account on any website. You can look for the saved login details in your browser settings.
  • The recovery option of AOL mail gives users an option to retrieve their forgotten passwords and usernames. To proceed with the recovery option, you must click on the ‘Forget Password?’ text below the area where you put your login details.
  • After hitting the Forget Password link, you will be taken to a page where they must enter their email address or AOL username.
  • Verify using the captcha, and specify the method of verifying yourself by your registered phone number or the AOL email address.
  • A verification code will be sent to your phone number or email address; upon entering the verification code on the next screen, you will be asked to enter your new password.

This is how you recover your forgotten password. In case you have forgotten your email address or AOL username. You have to enter your phone number on the sign-in helper page to receive your username on your phone.

You can easily retrieve your lost password or AOL mail username using these steps. If your login problems do not fall under any of the above, you can refer and contact the IT Support service or AOL mail help site through which they can get their lost account back.
